## Learning objectives
1. Understanding the principles of integrated urban planning and its importance in sustainable urban development from a transport and policy perspective.
2. Gaining knowledge of the specific experiences and strategies employed by Medellin, Colombia in the context of its recent urban transformation.
3. Acquiring practical intercultural tools and competencies for implementing sustainable urban development initiatives.
